name: Black Bear
actions_desc: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.
special_abilities_desc: The bear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
description: These creatures had black, blond, or cinnamon fur. Black bears on average were 5 ft (1.5 m).[2]These omnivore ursoids were not usually dangerous unless their cubs or food supply was threatened.[5][2]A black bear was found in the Wyllowwood level of Undermountain, where it enjoyed following strangers round for food.[6]Beyond the Prime Material plane, black bears could be found in the woods of Barovia.[8]
caption: The black bear was a forest-dwelling animal.
